name: BSO
comment:
>>37807741

> Nel defeated Guardian Construct. [[ Party: Vision, Ascheritte, Tatsumaki, Ayla ]]

You can't see what's going on upstairs. You hear weapons clashing. Stone against stone, and stone against steel.

"I've got you!" You charge forward, wedging the pike into the ground beneath the Pegasus. It's almost too heavy to lift. A wing flails by, and you duck away.

> Nel defeated Guardian Construct. [[ Party: Vision, Ascheritte, Tatsumaki, Ayla ]]

You hear your pike crack, and try to lift just enough to give her some room.

It bends at the balance point, about to give way.

Then, breaks, just as the small girl scrambles free from beneath the Pegasus. The damage is visible. She doesn't look like she should be moving as quickly as she is.

Ayla's ready to throw her bomb, but the Pegasus is recovering.

> Keep it down with the broken spear.
> Dodge.
> Other.
